content: I actually joined an online book club that focuses on reading and discussing fantasy novels, and "The First Fifteen Lives of Harry August" was our first book. It was really interesting to see how different people interpreted the story and its characters. I'm looking for more books that will challenge my mind like that one did, but I'm also open to exploring different genres and authors. Do you have any recommendations for books that are similar to "The Hating Game" by Sally Thorne, which I really enjoyed for its lighthearted and romantic tone?
